subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Opening day and optimism go well together, so there was no better time for Sandy Alderson, the Mets’ general manager, to deliver a rallying cry: “This team is now about being successful.”
snippet: Opening day and optimism go well together, so there was no better time for Sandy Alderson, the Mets’ general manager, to deliver a rallying cry: “This team is now about being successful.”
